sources.title: The Merry Mutineers (1936)
sources.description: Two little boys "battle" their toy pirate ships in a pool. The crews of both sea vessels are made of caricatures of such 30's era stars as Charles Laughton (as Captain Bligh), the Three Stooges, Wallace Beery, Jimmy Durante, Laurel & Hardy, and the Marx Brothers. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-merry-mutineers-1936/
